title: Lightning scales
data:
{{version031}} {{flavour|A set of armoured plates assembled to protect a creature with a long, scaly lower body. Faintly crackling with electricity, they supercharge their wearer's ability to cover distance.}} [[File:New lightning scales.png]] '''''the +6 lightning scales''''' +6 [[barding]] [[Running]] ego (-10% [[movement delay]])
rElec ==Desirability== The '''lightning scales'''{{source ref|0.30.0|art-data.txt|1187}} provide excellent defense (better than all mundane bardings), an uncommon resistance, and the only source of unconditional increased movement speed in the game. However, as it is a barding, only [[Naga]]s and [[Armataur]]s can wear it. Nagas with these scales will move below average speed (1.2 move delay), but that's still a significant improvement. It allows you to reposition without as many attacks, and lets you retreat a few more tiles before being attacked. The addition of [[Swiftness]] will allow them to finally move faster than average. Armataurs, meanwhile, get to permanently move at above-average speed. This is a large benefit - fast speed means you can [[kite]] enemies, avoid [[attacks of opportunity]], and retreat easier. Followers of [[Cheibriados]] should avoid this item, as that god forbids hasty items like this. ==History== *Prior to [[0.26]], only nagas could wear the lightning scales. *Prior to [[0.13]], this artefact always reduced movement delay by 2, but only had a +3 enchantment bonus to AC. *The lightning scales were added in [[0.10]]. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Barding]]
